review: A great device for convenience, no messy wires and no having to hook up my laptop to the TV. The remotes the best feature.
author: James Mets

review: It only gets a three because using it to display from a kindle hdx to your tv is basically useless due to poor quality picture and sound. This is actually the biggest problem with the new kindle hdx - no hdmi OUT except for the miracast ... and that frankly doesn't work very well. Very disappointed in that lack in new hdx coupled with the fire stick. If all you want is a cheap way to stream netflix or prime, it's okay for that ... but any device practically will do that.
author: RCH

review: It works great! Now I have a smart TV. The interface works extremely well even when using my tablet or phone as a remote.
author: Derek

review: I exchanged my chromecast for the firestick because of the remote, but this only recognized my router infrequently. I tried it on 3 different TVs, one right next to the router and still no luck. I returned it and will stick with chromecast
author: Ebony Thompson

review: As a "Prime" member, I expected more choices at no additional charge. The search function is the worst and Netflix isn't available unless I provide and payment card number (even though I am already paying Netflix for their service). Sticking with my Apple TV.
author: Gale Johnson

review: I would like to have more things that I like listed on prime. Past that I like it.
author: Drew

review: If it have more useful features, such as the ability to browse web pages, is perfect
author: john

review: I was able to get it for $20 when it was first released. Seems to work fairly quick (and that's without using external power!) and streams without any problems. It'd be worth getting at full price!
author: Goose
